Traits.Name: Aura of Dread
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of the Chernobyl Blackbird must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Nuclear Decay
Traits.Content: The air within 30 feet of the Chernobyl Blackbird is suffused with radioactive energy. Non-magical ranged attacks made within this area have disadvantage.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Chernobyl Blackbird makes two attacks with its Radiant Talons.

Actions.Name: Radiant Talons
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Nuclear Pulse (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The creature releases a wave of radioactive energy in a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 60 (10d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, affected creatures are poisoned until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Deathly Screech (Recharge 6)
Actions.Content: The Chernobyl Blackbird emits a horrific screech that reverberates through the air. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 32 (8d6) psychic damage and be frightened until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not frightened.
